text: Pitrazepin is a competitive GABAA and glycine receptor antagonist. It has been used to study insect and snail nervous systems in scientific research. ==See also== * Bicuculline * Strychnine ==References== Category:Convulsants Category:GABAA receptor antagonists Category:Glycine receptor antagonists Category:Piperazines Category:Triazoles
title: Pitrazepin
